entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 50S IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
